deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text:
@title Destructible contract.
 Allows the contract to be destroyed by its owner.
@dev Destroys the contract and sends remaining funds to the owner.

@dev Destroys the contract and sends remaining funds to a specified address.
 @param _recipient The address to receive the remaining funds.

destroy().details: Destroys the contract and sends remaining funds to the owner.

destroyAndSend(address).details: Destroys the contract and sends remaining funds to a specified address.

params._recipient: The address to receive the remaining funds.

devdoc.title: Destructible contract. Allows the contract to be destroyed by its owner.
